prod_desc: What time is it? It’s LEGO® Adventure Time™!
prod_long_desc:
Display and role-play with this LEGO® Adventure Time™ set, featuring eight buildable Adventure Time characters with an assortment of play-starting accessory elements. An ideal gift for fans of the popular Cartoon Network animated TV series.
Features eight buildable LEGO® brick Adventure Time™ characters: Finn, Jake, Princess Bubblegum, Lady Rainicorn, Marceline, BMO, Ice King and Gunter.
Finn, Princess Bubblegum, Marceline and Ice King each have movable arms.
Includes Finn’s sword.
Accessory elements include Marceline's axe-bass, BMO's joysticks and Ice King's translucent-blue stars.
Great for display or role-playing funny scenes from Cartoon Network's Adventure Time™ series.
Includes a booklet about the animated TV series and the fan designer of this set.
This set includes over 495 pieces.
Finn stands over 2” tall.
Jake stands over 1” tall.
Princess Bubblegum stands over 3” tall.
Lady Rainicorn measures over 2” tall and 7” long.
Marceline stands over 3” tall.
BMO stands over 1” tall.
Gunter stands over 1” tall.
Ice King stands over 4” tall.
